Articles.Content:
Morning everybody. After browsing the forums for ages now and never having an actual account, I've finally created one. I've been playing KSP for a little over a year, if I remember correctly. I've got a few hundred hours in, but not much to show for it honestly, besides some pretty rad explosions.  

I'm open to giving some basic advice as well as receiving, should anybody feel so inclined. In the words of the KSP Messiah, fly safe.

Hello Kerbin vonKerbal and welcome to the forum!

Come in from the cold, lurker.

Happy landings!
